===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to be [[regarding]]; to be [[in terms of]]; to be [[speaking]] of; to be [[as far as]] something is concerned
#: {{zh-x|就 目前 而言|as it stands}}
#: {{zh-x|從 總體 而言|on the whole}}
#: {{zh-x|相{xiāng}比 而言|by comparison}}
#: {{zh-x|對於 世界 經濟 而言，狀況 同樣 如此。|'''As far as''' the global economy '''is concerned''', the situation is the same.}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|而言|tr=éryán}} is always put at the end of a sentence structure which starts with a preposition, such as {{zh-l|對於|regarding}}, {{zh-l|就|in [terms of]}} or {{zh-l|從|from}}, or is collocated with {{zh-l|相比|comparison}}.
